00016 #include "DummySync.h"
00017 #include "TTEScheduler.h"
00018 #include "SchedulerMessageEvents_m.h"
00019 
00020 using namespace TTEthernetModel;
00021 
00022 Define_Module( DummySync);
00023 
00024 void DummySync::initialize()
00025 {
00026     TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00027     SchedulerActionTimeEvent *event = new SchedulerActionTimeEvent("Sync Task Event", ACTION_TIME_EVENT);
00028     event->setAction_time(par("action_time").longValue());
00029     event->setDestinationGate(gate("schedulerIn"));
00030     tteScheduler->registerEvent(event);
00031 }
00032 
00033 void DummySync::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00034 {
00035     TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00036     if(msg->arrivedOn("schedulerIn")){
00037         if(tteScheduler->getCycles()>1){
00038             unsigned int cycleTicks = tteScheduler->par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00039             double tick = tteScheduler->par("tick").doubleValue();
00040 
00041             int modticks = ((int)(simTime().dbl()/tick)-par("action_time").longValue())%cycleTicks;
00042             if(modticks>(cycleTicks/2))
00043                 modticks=modticks-cycleTicks;
00044             modticks+=uniform(-par("precission").doubleValue()/2, par("precission").doubleValue()/2)/tick;
00045 
00046             tteScheduler->clockCorrection(-modticks);
00047         }
00048 
00049         SchedulerActionTimeEvent *event = (SchedulerActionTimeEvent *)msg;
00050         tteScheduler->registerEvent(event);
00051     }
00052 }
